20-001SC.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Wednesday, December 4, 2019.Attachments: FinishedAgendaAndMinutes 12-4-19.pdfFinishedAgendaAndMinutes 12-4-19.pdfA motion was made by Vice Chair Wheeler, seconded by Commissioner Gonzales, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 5 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 6 - Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Nicholas Lind, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff and Coby SkyePage 2 of 10CITY COUNCIL CHAMBER411 W. 20-002SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from Oceana on a federal drilling resolution and forward to City Council for consideration.Attachments: costa_mesa_resolution.pdfcosta_mesa_resolution.pdfel_segundo_resolution.pdfel_segundo_resolution.pdfOverview of 2019-2024 DPP_updated 3.22.18.pdfOverview of 2019-2024 DPP_updated 3.22.18.pdfOceana SF_LB_City_Sustainability_Preso.pdfOceana SF_LB_City_Sustainability_Preso.pdfNancy Downes, Campaign Organizer, Southern California Oceana Staff, gave presentation from Oceana on a federal drilling resolution and forward to City council for consideration.Members from the public spoke.A dialogue ensued between the public and Chair Coffee.Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainable City Coordinator, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.A dialogue ensued between Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, Larry Rich, Sustainable City Coordinator, and Chair Coffee.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, spoke.(Commissioner Gaytan walked in @ 4:34 pm)ROLL CALLCommissioners  Present:Sona Coffee,  Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock, Donna Bergeron-Birge, Morgan Wheeler, Jenny Novak, and Hilda GaytanCommissioners Absent:Nicholas Lind, Carla Dillon, Coby Skye and Alan TolkoffPage 3 of 10CITY COUNCIL CHAMBER411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARD, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 23, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESVice Chair Wheeler spoke.Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.A dialogue ensued between Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, Larry Rich, Sustainable City Coordinator, and Chair Coffee.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainable City Coordinator, spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Nancy Downes, Oceana Staff, Larry Rich, Sustainable City Coordinator, and Chair Coffee.A motion was made by Commissioner Novak, seconded by Commissioner Bergeron-Birge, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Donna Bergeron-Birge, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Morgan Wheeler and Sona Coffee   Commissioners Present:Carla Dillon, Nicholas Lind, Alan Tolkoff and Coby Skye   Commissioners Absent:Page 4 of 10CITY COUNCIL CHAMBER411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARD, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 23, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTES3.

20-003SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Department of Energy Resources on Wilmington Field Operations Outlook.Attachments: Oil Outlook (002).pdfOil Outlook (002).pdfKevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations,  gave presentation from the Department of Enery Resources on  Wilmington Field Operations Outlook.Chair Coffee spoke.Members from the public spoke.Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.A dialogue ensued between the public and Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations.Chair Coffee spoke.A dialogue ensued between the public and Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations.Chair Coffee spoke.Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Edward Farrell, Manager with Gas Services Bureau, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Rock spoke.Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations, spoke.Commissioner Rock spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Rock and Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations.Page 5 of 10CITY COUNCIL CHAMBER411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARD, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 23, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Gaytan spoke.Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee, Kevin Tougas, Manager Oil Operations and Rep from Deptartment of Energy Resources.Chair Coffee spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Rock, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 4 - Carla Dillon, Nicholas Lind, Alan Tolkoff and Coby SkyePage 6 of 10CITY COUNCIL CHAMBER411 W.
